Druid Summoner.Name: Druid Summoner
Druid Summoner.Ability: SLOW Once per turn; you can deploy an 'Animal' unit of cost 1 or less from your hand or of cost 2 or less if an 'Animal' is in support

Wolf Druid.Name: Wolf Druid
Wolf Druid.Ability: 1PT, before attack; this unit can turn into a melee 'Dog Animal' unit and gains 2 total health or back into its original form losing 2 bonus health

Druid King.Name: Druid King
Druid King.Ability: Gains the power and ability of a supporting 'Animal'

Recon Druid.Name: Recon Druid
Recon Druid.Ability:
Grants HASTE  to an ‘Animal’ in support
Gains HASTE if an ‘Animal’ is in support

Hunting Wolf.Name: Hunting Wolf
Hunting Wolf.Ability: Gains 1 power for each other allied 'Dog'

Cattle Dog.Name: Cattle Dog
Cattle Dog.Ability: GOLD 1 Target enemy unit; Move target unit into a free zone in the same column as this card

Pistol Shrimp.Name: Pistol Shrimp
Pistol Shrimp.Ability: This unit's attacks cause the defending units next attack's damage to be reduced by 2

Sea Captain.Name: Sea Captain
Sea Captain.Ability:
Grants all 'Pirate' units you control RUSH
This unit gains power equal to your current gold

Navigator.Name: Navigator
Navigator.Ability:
While in support of a 'Ship' gains SCOUTING 
Supporting unit gains SCOUTING

Cannoneer.Name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer.Ability: Gain 3 power while there is a ship in support

Hardened Chef.Name: Hardened Chef
Hardened Chef.Ability: If there is a supporting 'Pirate' this unit gains 2 Health, If you control a 'Ship' instead all 'Pirate's gain 2 Health

Crazy Samuel.Name: Crazy Samuel
Crazy Samuel.Ability:
This unit gains abilities based on the sum of the 'Pirate's and 'Ship's you control; 2 or more: Gain 1 power 
3 or more: Gain HASTE 
4 or more: Gain an additional attack

Black Eye.Name: Black Eye
Black Eye.Ability:
PIERCING 
On Deployment; deal 3 damage to up to X enemies where X is the sum of ships you control or are in your grave

Pirate Recruiter.Name: Pirate Recruiter
Pirate Recruiter.Ability: On deployment; INVESTIGATE Unit 2, you may add a 'Pirate' from the revealed cards and if you control a ship reduce its cost by 1

First Mate.Name: First Mate
First Mate.Ability: This unit's cost is reduced by 1 if you control a 'Pirate Leader' All 'Pirate' units gain 1 power if you control a ship

Pirate Apprentice.Name: Pirate Apprentice
Pirate Apprentice.Ability:
Cost 0 while you control a 'Ship'
When another pirate attacks; Gain 1 power until end

Ghastly terror.Name: Ghastly terror
Ghastly terror.Ability: On deploy; This unit gains Power and health equal to the number of units in both graveyards

Rugged skeleton.Name: Rugged skeleton
Rugged skeleton.Ability: When a unit you control (except 'Rugged Skeleton') is sent to grave; You can summon this card to the zone of that unit

Bulging Spawn.Name: Bulging Spawn
Bulging Spawn.Ability: When this unit is sent from field to grave; place up to 2 1G 2/1 Melee 'Undead' units in free zones.

Soulless Pillager.Name: Soulless Pillager
Soulless Pillager.Ability: Whenever another unit you control is sent to the grave; gain gold equal to half of its cost. (Round up)

Exploding Zombie.Name: Exploding Zombie
Exploding Zombie.Ability: If this unit is sent to the grave, target enemy; deal 2 damage to it

The Butcher.Name: The Butcher
The Butcher.Ability: GOLD 1 (0 if the opponent controls more units) When this unit is deployed; Sacrifice a unit, the opponent sacrifices a unit with lowest health (your choice if tied)

Skeleton Archer.Name: Skeleton Archer
Skeleton Archer.Ability: Before draw, if this card is in the graveyard and you have a unit hand; discard it and play this card

Runner.Name: Runner
Runner.Ability:
HASTE 
If this unit was deployed from the grave it gains +1 power

Gravedigger.Name: Gravedigger
Gravedigger.Ability: On deploy; INVESTIGATE unit 3, destroy a unit investigated, G1 Deploy that unit before destroying it

Cultist Mimic.Name: Cultist Mimic
Cultist Mimic.Ability: When this unit is deployed; You may play a spell from your grave then exile it. If it is a 'Oath' spell you may play it for free.

Group Caster.Name: Group Caster
Group Caster.Ability:
Oath' spells cost 1 less (min 1) while you control another 'Cultist'
You can sacrifice this and 2 other units; Play a dragon unit from your deck

Spell Hoarding Dragon.Name: Spell Hoarding Dragon
Spell Hoarding Dragon.Ability: On deploy; You can bottom stack any number of Spells in your grave, this unit gains 1 Power and 1 Health per spell

Cursed Fighter.Name: Cursed Fighter
Cursed Fighter.Ability: When a spell is played; Gain 1 power until the end of the turn

Cultist Treasurer.Name: Cultist Treasurer
Cultist Treasurer.Ability: SLOW, 2PT, when you play an 'Oath' Spell; Gain 1 Gold

Cultist Priest.Name: Cultist Priest
Cultist Priest.Ability: (2PT) When you cast a 'Oath' spell; You may draw from your spell deck

Cultist Scribe.Name: Cultist Scribe
Cultist Scribe.Ability: When this card is deployed; Search 1 'Oath' spell

Cultist Martyr.Name: Cultist Martyr
Cultist Martyr.Ability: When this card is sent from field to grave; The next spell you cast has cost -1, if its a 'Oath' Spell its free

Cultist Thief.Name: Cultist Thief
Cultist Thief.Ability:
HASTE
If this card deals face damage; You can look at your opponents spell hand, you may cast a spell from it as a 'Cultist' spell at cost -1 (min 1)
